hero.title: Smart technology for seamless yachting

lines: Planning with captains and ETOs to size networks and racks.
Integration of Starlink, Peplink, Fortinet and Crestron according to each onboard use.

pillars.title: 24/7 Support
pillars.description: Remote monitoring, alerts and crew coordination in minutes.

pillars.title: Boutique integration

pillars.title: Clear documentation

connectivity.name: Worldwide Connectivity
connectivity.shortDescription: Resilient Multi-WAN combining Starlink, 4G/5G and WiFi 6 to keep the yacht always online.

benefits.title: Smart Multi-WAN
benefits.description: Starlink LEO, 4G/5G and VSAT with automatic failover.

benefits.title: Premium WiFi 6
benefits.description: Complete coverage with QoS and segmentation for crew and guests.

benefits.title: 24/7 Remote management
benefits.description: Continuous monitoring and immediate adjustments for each route.

process.title: Signal audit
process.description: Study of routes, ports and existing racks.

process.title: Redundant architecture
process.description: Multi-link design with load balancing and automatic failover.

process.title: QoS optimization
process.description: Critical application prioritization and guest profiles.

process.title: Continuous monitoring
process.description: Cloud dashboard with alerts and proactive support.

hero.description: Connectivity systems with automatic failover, load balancing and proactive monitoring for the Mediterranean and beyond.

caseStudy.challenge: Outages between Starlink and 4G/5G during long routes.
caseStudy.solution: Managed Multi-WAN with prioritization policies and VSAT backup.
caseStudy.result: >99 percent availability and recovery in under ten seconds.

faq.question: Is Starlink subscription required?
faq.answer: We integrate Starlink where relevant but always combine multiple providers to maintain redundancy.

faq.question: Is remote support included?
faq.answer: Yes, we monitor links 24/7 and adjust with the crew.

cybersecurity.name: Cybersecurity
cybersecurity.shortDescription: Robust digital perimeters with next-generation firewalls, segmentation and recurring audits.

benefits.title: NGFW Firewalls
benefits.description: Fortinet and Peplink management with custom rules and continuous updates.

benefits.title: Advanced segmentation
benefits.description: Separate networks for crew, guests, automation and instrumentation.

benefits.title: IoT hardening
benefits.description: Controlled firmware, secure access and Zero Trust policy for each device.

process.title: Regular review
process.description: Penetration testing and quarterly improvement plan.

hero.description: Zero Trust networks with next-generation firewalls, VLAN segmentation and continuous security monitoring.

caseStudy.challenge: Guest networks compromising navigation and AV systems.
caseStudy.solution: Fortinet NGFW with dedicated VLANs and MFA.
caseStudy.result: Zero incidents and successful security audit.

faq.question: How do you protect guest access?
faq.answer: We implement dedicated VLANs with bandwidth limits and Zero Trust policies.

faq.question: Can you secure IoT devices?
faq.answer: Yes, we control firmware updates and network access for each device.

sectionHeaders.servicesDescription: Comprehensive connectivity, cybersecurity, AV and IoT solutions designed specifically for the nautical environment and adapted to each vessel's needs.

connectivity.title: Global Connectivity
connectivity.description: Multi-WAN architectures with Starlink, VSAT and 4G/5G for uninterrupted connectivity across any ocean.

cybersecurity.title: Maritime Cybersecurity
cybersecurity.description: Zero Trust protection with Fortinet, network segmentation and 24/7 monitoring for critical assets.

features.automation: Integrated automation with smart home systems

integration.description: All systems work as a unified ecosystem, optimizing performance and simplifying management.

technologySection.title: Cutting-edge technology
technologySection.description: We work with Starlink, Ubiquiti, Peplink, Fortinet and Crestron to ensure up-to-date infrastructure and global support.

partners.name: Starlink
partners.copy: LEO satellite connectivity and maritime hardware deployment.

partners.name: Ubiquiti
partners.copy: High-performance WiFi 6 mesh networks with centralized management.

partners.name: Peplink
partners.copy: Multi-WAN routers with bonding and automatic failover.

partners.name: Fortinet
partners.copy: Next-generation cybersecurity with Zero Trust policies.

partners.name: Crestron
partners.copy: AV control and automation with customized interfaces.

casesSection.heading: Recent projects
casesSection.description: Multi-WAN engineering, Zero Trust policies and AV automation deployed alongside captains and shipyards.

cases.challenge: A charter fleet suffered outages when moving from ports with limited coverage to open sea crossings.
cases.solution: We designed multi-WAN architecture with Peplink routers, maritime Starlink and centrally managed VSAT backup.
cases.result: Continuous connectivity throughout the season and 24/7 remote monitoring.

cases.challenge: Guest access was putting navigation and entertainment systems at risk.
cases.solution: We implemented Fortinet NGFW, dedicated VLANs and multi-factor authentication with SIEM monitoring.
cases.result: Zero incidents in the last campaign and successfully passed external audit.

cases.challenge: A 38-meter yacht wanted to unify cinema, meetings and music with simple control for the crew.
cases.solution: We integrated UHD matrix, hidden audio, custom scenes and Crestron panels synchronized with home automation.
cases.result: Fluid multi-room experience and complete adoption by crew and guests.

blogSection.title: Netnautica technical guides and resources
blogSection.description: Explore our publications on connectivity, cybersecurity and onboard entertainment.

items.question: How do you ensure stable connectivity while sailing?
items.answer: We audit routes and ports, combine Starlink, 4G/5G and VSAT with multi-WAN routers and 24/7 remote monitoring.

items.question: Can you work with our crew and installers?
items.answer: Yes, we coordinate with captains, shipyards and interior designers to integrate cabling, racks and automation without affecting finishes.

items.question: Does support include cybersecurity and IoT?
items.answer: Our plan covers firewalls, segmentation, IoT updates and remote assistance to resolve incidents in minutes.
